descripcion:
In the heart of Arenys de Mar, on the town's most emblematic and prestigious street, we present this exclusive and incomparable residence, close to the beach, the station and all services.
With an area of 450 m², the house has been completely renovated and equipped with high-end finishes, becoming a true gem that combines the elegance of its original architecture with the comfort of a modern home.

It has a large living-dining room, independent designer kitchen fully equipped with access to a spectacular patio, and a total of 5 bedrooms (several en suite), all designed for maximum comfort. The house has high-end parquet floors, luxury furniture, air conditioning in all rooms, 4 bathrooms, office with fireplace, multipurpose entrance room, cellar, garden and garage included in the price. In addition, it is equipped with an elevator for greater comfort. All the house's installations (electricity, gas, air conditioning) have been installed from scratch with the most modern technologies.

Outside, the spacious patio offers the possibility of building a private pool, creating a luxury oasis in the center of town.

A unique and unrepeatable property in Maresme, perfect for those seeking exclusivity, design and comfort in a privileged setting by the sea.

Purchase costs not included in the sale price.
